name: Space To Make It
description:
Jump your way through space as you handle low gravity and tricky jumps to make your way through an out of this world adventure.

Controls:

W,A,S,D Moves your Spaceman

Space Bar Jumps

Left Click Fire a projectile (that interacts with both you and the environment)

Right Click Turns you around for when you need to stop on a dime or do fancy maneuvers.
